mapper.select: select id, title from blog order by id desc
select id, title, password from blog where is_published=true order by id desc

select b.id, b.title, b.description, b.is_top, b.create_time, b.views, b.words, b.read_time, b.password, c.category_name from blog as b left join category as c on b.category_id=c.id where b.is_published=true

select b.id, b.title, b.description, b.is_top, b.create_time, b.views, b.words, b.read_time, b.password, c.category_name from category as c left join blog as b on b.category_id=c.id where c.category_name=#{categoryName} and b.is_published=true
select date_format(create_time, "%Y年%m月") from blog where is_published=true group by date_format(create_time, "%Y年%m月") order by date_format(create_time, "%Y年%m月") desc
select id, title, password, date_format(create_time, "%d日") as create_day from blog where date_format(create_time, "%Y年%m月")=#{yearMonth} and is_published=true order by create_time desc
select id, title, password, create_time, first_picture from blog where is_published=true and is_recommend=true order by rand() limit #{limitNum}
select id, views from blog ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: insert into blog (title, first_picture, content, description, is_published, is_recommend, is_appreciation, is_comment_enabled, is_top, create_time, update_time, views, words, read_time, category_id, user_id, password) values (#{title}, #{firstPicture}, #{content}, #{description}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{appreciation}, #{commentEnabled}, #{top}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{views}, #{words}, #{readTime}, #{category.id}, #{user.id}, #{password})
mapper.update: update blog set is_recommend=#{recommend} where id=#{blogId}
update blog set is_top=#{top} where id=#{blogId}
update blog set views=#{views} where id=#{blogId}
mapper.select: select title from blog where id=#{id}

select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.is_appreciation, b.is_comment_enabled, b.is_top, b.create_time, b.update_time, b.views, b.words, b.read_time, b.password, c.category_name, t.tag_name as tag_name, t.color from (((blog as b left join category as c on b.category_id=c.id) left join blog_tag as bt on b.id=bt.blog_id) left join tag as t on bt.tag_id=t.id) where b.id=#{id} and b.is_published=true
select password from blog where id=#{blogId}
select count(*) from blog
select count(*) from blog where is_published=true
select count(*) from blog where category_id=#{categoryId}
select count(*) from blog_tag where tag_id=#{tagId}
select is_comment_enabled from blog where id=#{blogId}
select is_published from blog where id=#{blogId}
select category_id, count(category_id) as blog_count from blog group by category_id
